componentType.description: Translates signals from a certain input range to an output range

inputPort.description: Input port to be translated to output signal range
set maximum of input signal (for auto-scale)
set minimum of input signal (for auto-scale)

eventTriggererPort.description: this event is generated if the defined input range was entered by the last input value
this event is generated if the defined input range was left by the last input value, which was smaller than inMin
this event is generated if the defined input range was left by the last input value, which was greater than inMax

property.name: inMin
property.description: Defines the minimal value of the input range

property.name: inMax
property.description: Defines the maximal value of the input range

property.name: outMin
property.description: Defines the minimal value of the output range

property.name: outMax
property.description: Defines the maximal value of the output range

property.name: stepMode
property.description: If true, stepMode is activated and stepwise output according to property 'thresholdList' is generated.

property.name: thresholdList
property.description: If 'stepMode' is true, the given list of values define a stepwise output function. The output range is split up to [n] parts and each value defines the percentage of the output range that is outputted for the corresponding part.
